<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[48]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_boston</span> <span class="c1"># ボストン宅地価格のデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span> <span class="c1">#　Gradient Boostingのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span> <span class="c1"># 評価関数ライブラリ</span>

<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_boston</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;MEDV&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.25</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1"># GradientBoosting関数をxgb変数に代入</span>
<span class="c1"># max_depth:木の深さ, n_estimators:木の数</span>
<span class="n">xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_estimators</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_depth</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
<span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1"># モデルが出来るているかの確認</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルに　.predict(テスト用説明変数(特徴量)) でテストデータの予測値をy_predに代入</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># R2値を計算し，r2変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;R2値:&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>


<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>R2値: 0.909945531611032
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>アンサンブル学習（ランダムフォレスト（random forest）や勾配ブースティング（gradient boosting））は，通常の線形回帰による学習よりも良い性能のモデルを作成できる場合が多い</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[49]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span> <span class="c1"># 評価関数ライブラリ</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">depth_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">depth_list</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_estimators</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_depth</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">r2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">scatter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">depth_list</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">depth_list</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;R2値&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;木の深さ&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;木の深さによる予測性能の違い&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[49]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Text(0.5, 1.0, &#39;木の深さによる予測性能の違い&#39;)</pre>
</div>

</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>GradientBoostingRegressor(n_estimators="木の数", max_depth="木の深さ", random_state=1)<br>
木の深さや木の数は多ければいいわけではなく，その時その時によって最適の数がある<br>
これをハイパーパラメータチューニングと言う（詳しくは第12回目の演習で行う）</p>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="bagging&#65292;Boosting&#65292;&#27770;&#23450;&#26408;&#12399;&#21508;&#33258;&#30906;&#35469;">bagging&#65292;Boosting&#65292;&#27770;&#23450;&#26408;&#12399;&#21508;&#33258;&#30906;&#35469;<a class="anchor-link" href="#bagging&#65292;Boosting&#65292;&#27770;&#23450;&#26408;&#12399;&#21508;&#33258;&#30906;&#35469;">&#182;</a></h4><h4 id="*&#28436;&#32722;&#20013;&#12399;&#39131;&#12400;&#12375;&#12414;&#12377;">*&#28436;&#32722;&#20013;&#12399;&#39131;&#12400;&#12375;&#12414;&#12377;<a class="anchor-link" href="#*&#28436;&#32722;&#20013;&#12399;&#39131;&#12400;&#12375;&#12414;&#12377;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#27770;&#23450;&#26408;"><strong>&#27770;&#23450;&#26408;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#27770;&#23450;&#26408;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span> <span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.tree</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">DecisionTreeClassifier</span> <span class="c1">#　決定木のライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセットをdatasetに代入</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 決定木関数をdtc変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">dtc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">DecisionTreeClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
<span class="n">dtc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># モデルが出来るているかの確認</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span> <span class="c1"># 評価関数ライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルに　.predict(テスト用説明変数(特徴量)) でテストデータの予測値をy_predに代入</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dtc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># R2値を計算し，r2変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="bagging"><strong>bagging</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#bagging">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span> <span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">BaggingClassifier</span> <span class="c1">#　Baggingのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.tree</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">DecisionTreeClassifier</span> <span class="c1">#　決定木のライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセットをdatasetに代入</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># bagging関数をbag変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">bag</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">BaggingClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">DecisionTreeClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">n_estimators</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 比較のためbaggingしないケースとして決定木関数をnobag変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">nobag</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">DecisionTreeClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
<span class="n">bag</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">nobag</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1"># モデルが出来るているかの確認</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span> <span class="c1"># 評価関数ライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># Baggingしたケース</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルに　.predict(テスト用説明変数(特徴量)) でテストデータの予測値をy_predに代入</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">bag</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># R2値を計算し，r2変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># Baggingしないケース</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nobag</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># R2値を計算し，r2変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Boosting"><strong>Boosting</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Boosting">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span> <span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">AdaBoostRegressor</span> <span class="c1">#　Boositingのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.tree</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">DecisionTreeRegressor</span> <span class="c1">#　決定木のライブラリ</span>
                         
<span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセットをdatasetに代入</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># boosting関数をbst変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">bst</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">AdaBoostRegressor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">DecisionTreeRegressor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">n_estimators</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> 

<span class="c1"># 比較のためboostingしないケースとして決定木関数をnobst変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">nobst</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">DecisionTreeRegressor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
<span class="n">bst</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">nobst</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="c1"># モデルが出来るているかの確認</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span> <span class="c1"># 評価関数ライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># Boostingしたケース</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルに　.predict(テスト用説明変数(特徴量)) でテストデータの予測値をy_predに代入</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">bst</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># R2値を計算し，r2変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># Boostingしないケース</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nobst</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># R2値を計算し，r2変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="4.-&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#35413;&#20385;"><strong>4. &#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#35413;&#20385;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#4.-&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#35413;&#20385;">&#182;</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>訓練データを使い，機械学習でモデルを作成した後，テストデータを使い「本当に良いモデルなのか？」という評価を必要があります．</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="4.1-&#20998;&#39006;&#12398;&#22580;&#21512;&#65306;AUC&#12392;ROC"><strong>4.1 &#20998;&#39006;&#12398;&#22580;&#21512;&#65306;AUC&#12392;ROC</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#4.1-&#20998;&#39006;&#12398;&#22580;&#21512;&#65306;AUC&#12392;ROC">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>二値分類の機械学習モデルのパフォーマンスを評価する</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>  <span class="c1"># numpy</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1">#pandas ライブリラの読み込み</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span> <span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">svm</span> <span class="c1"># svmのライブラリ</span>
<span class="c1">#from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression # ロジスティック回帰のライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">roc_curve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">auc</span> <span class="c1"># auc-roc ライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセットをdatasetに代入</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># svm関数をclf変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">svm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">SVC</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
<span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># モデルが出来るているかの確認</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span> <span class="c1"># 評価関数ライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルに　.predict(テスト用説明変数(特徴量)) でテストデータの予測値をy_predに代入</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># R2値を計算し，r2変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># ROC曲線計算</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">metrics</span>

<span class="c1"># FPR(偽陽性率), TPR(真陽性率), 閾値（0か1を判定し分類する閾値）</span>
<span class="n">fpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">thresholds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">metrics</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">roc_curve</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># AUC</span>
<span class="n">auc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">metrics</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">auc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tpr</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># ROC曲線をプロット</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;ROC curve (auc = </span><span class="si">%.2f</span><span class="s1">)&#39;</span> <span class="o">%</span><span class="k">auc</span>)
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ROC curve&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;偽陽性率（False Positive Rate）&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;真陽性率（True Positive Rate）&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="4.2-&#22238;&#24112;&#12398;&#22580;&#21512;&#65306;&#23455;&#28204;&#20516;&#12392;&#20104;&#28204;&#20516;&#12395;&#12424;&#12427;&#35413;&#20385;&#65288;&#25968;&#20516;&#12395;&#12424;&#12427;&#35413;&#20385;&#65289;"><strong>4.2 &#22238;&#24112;&#12398;&#22580;&#21512;&#65306;&#23455;&#28204;&#20516;&#12392;&#20104;&#28204;&#20516;&#12395;&#12424;&#12427;&#35413;&#20385;&#65288;&#25968;&#20516;&#12395;&#12424;&#12427;&#35413;&#20385;&#65289;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#4.2-&#22238;&#24112;&#12398;&#22580;&#21512;&#65306;&#23455;&#28204;&#20516;&#12392;&#20104;&#28204;&#20516;&#12395;&#12424;&#12427;&#35413;&#20385;&#65288;&#25968;&#20516;&#12395;&#12424;&#12427;&#35413;&#20385;&#65289;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="MAE-(Mean-Absolute-Error:&#24179;&#22343;&#32118;&#23550;&#35492;&#24046;)"><strong>MAE (Mean Absolute Error:&#24179;&#22343;&#32118;&#23550;&#35492;&#24046;)</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#MAE-(Mean-Absolute-Error:&#24179;&#22343;&#32118;&#23550;&#35492;&#24046;)">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
$$
MAE = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^{N}|y_i-\hat{y_i}|
$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>$MAE$は実測値$y$と予測値$\hat{y_i}$の差の平均（誤差平均）を表す．</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="MaxAE-(Maximum-Absolute-Error:&#26368;&#22823;&#32118;&#23550;&#35492;&#24046;)"><strong>MaxAE (Maximum Absolute Error:&#26368;&#22823;&#32118;&#23550;&#35492;&#24046;)</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#MaxAE-(Maximum-Absolute-Error:&#26368;&#22823;&#32118;&#23550;&#35492;&#24046;)">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
$$
MaxAE(c)=max|x_i−c|
$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="R-(Pearson&#12398;&#30456;&#38306;&#20418;&#25968;)"><strong>R (Pearson&#12398;&#30456;&#38306;&#20418;&#25968;)</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#R-(Pearson&#12398;&#30456;&#38306;&#20418;&#25968;)">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
$$
r = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{N}(x_i-\bar{x})(y_i-\bar{y})}{\sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^{N}(x_i-\bar{x})^2} \sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^{N}(y_i-\bar{y})^2}}
$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>2つの数値データ間$(x_1, y_1),(x_2, y_2),...,(x_i, y_i)$の線型性の強さを示す（相関係数）． <br></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="R2-(R-squared:&#27770;&#23450;&#20418;&#25968;)"><strong>R2 (R-squared:&#27770;&#23450;&#20418;&#25968;)</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#R2-(R-squared:&#27770;&#23450;&#20418;&#25968;)">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
$$
r^2 = 1 - \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{N}(y_i-\hat{y_i})^2}{\sum_{i=1}^{N}(y_i-\bar{y_i})^2}
$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="MSE-(Mean-Square-Error:&#24179;&#22343;&#20108;&#20055;&#35492;&#24046;)"><strong>MSE (Mean Square Error:&#24179;&#22343;&#20108;&#20055;&#35492;&#24046;)</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#MSE-(Mean-Square-Error:&#24179;&#22343;&#20108;&#20055;&#35492;&#24046;)">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
$$
MSE = \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}(y_i-\hat{y_i})^2
$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="RMSE-(Root-Mean-Square-Error:&#20108;&#20055;&#24179;&#22343;&#24179;&#26041;&#26681;&#35492;&#24046;)"><strong>RMSE (Root Mean Square Error:&#20108;&#20055;&#24179;&#22343;&#24179;&#26041;&#26681;&#35492;&#24046;)</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#RMSE-(Root-Mean-Square-Error:&#20108;&#20055;&#24179;&#22343;&#24179;&#26041;&#26681;&#35492;&#24046;)">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
$$
MSE = \sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^{N}(y_i-\hat{y_i})^2}
$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[51]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span>

<span class="c1"># データの読み込み</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./Tm_data.csv&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">header</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># headerなしの場合はNone</span>
                 
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">249</span><span class="p">]</span>  <span class="c1"># 全行対象,3-249列目をXとする</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>  <span class="c1"># 全行対象,2列名を目的変数にする</span>

<span class="c1"># モデルの選択</span>
<span class="c1">#max_depth:木の深さ, n_estimators:木の数</span>
<span class="n">est</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_estimators</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_depth</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># モデルの学習</span>
<span class="n">est</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># evaluate a model by R2 score</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span>
<span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">est</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;R2 score: </span><span class="si">%.3f</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<h4 id="4.3-K&#20998;&#21106;&#20132;&#24046;&#26908;&#35388;&#65306;&#12463;&#12525;&#12473;&#12496;&#12522;&#12487;&#12540;&#12471;&#12519;&#12531;&#65288;K-hold&#65289;"><strong>4.3 K&#20998;&#21106;&#20132;&#24046;&#26908;&#35388;&#65306;&#12463;&#12525;&#12473;&#12496;&#12522;&#12487;&#12540;&#12471;&#12519;&#12531;&#65288;K-hold&#65289;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#4.3-K&#20998;&#21106;&#20132;&#24046;&#26908;&#35388;&#65306;&#12463;&#12525;&#12473;&#12496;&#12522;&#12487;&#12540;&#12471;&#12519;&#12531;&#65288;K-hold&#65289;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="KFold"><strong>KFold</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#KFold">&#182;</a></h4><p>データをK個に分け，n個を訓練用データ，K-n個をテスト用データに分割する <br>
分割したn個のデータがテスト用デートとして <b> 必ず1回だけ使われるようにn回検証する <br></p>
<p>オプション <br>
n_split：データの分割数． 指定した数値の回数の検証を行う <br>
shuffle：Trueの場合，連番でグループ分けせず，ランダムにデータを選択する <br>
random_state：乱数 <br></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="4.4-&#12463;&#12525;&#12473;&#12496;&#12522;&#12487;&#12540;&#12471;&#12519;&#12531;-:-&#20998;&#39006;"><strong>4.4 &#12463;&#12525;&#12473;&#12496;&#12522;&#12487;&#12540;&#12471;&#12519;&#12531; : &#20998;&#39006;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#4.4-&#12463;&#12525;&#12473;&#12496;&#12522;&#12487;&#12540;&#12471;&#12519;&#12531;-:-&#20998;&#39006;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span> <span class="c1"># numpy</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>  <span class="c1"># numpy</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1">#pandas ライブリラの読み込み</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span> <span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">svm</span> <span class="c1"># svmのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">metrics</span> <span class="c1"># ROC曲線計算</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">roc_curve</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">auc</span> <span class="c1"># auc-roc ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">KFold</span> <span class="c1"># 交差検証のライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># ヴィスコンシン州乳がんのデータセットをdatasetに代入</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_breast_cancer</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># svm関数をclf変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">clf</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">svm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">SVC</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># 交差検証</span>
<span class="n">cv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">KFold</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_splits</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">shuffle</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">):</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
    <span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,],</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,])</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルに　.predict(テスト用説明変数(特徴量)) でテストデータの予測値をy_predに代入</span>
    <span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">clf</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">,])</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># FPR(偽陽性率), TPR(真陽性率), しきい値</span>
    <span class="n">fpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">thresholds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">roc_curve</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># AUC</span>
    <span class="n">auc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">metrics</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">auc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tpr</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># ROC曲線をプロット</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tpr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lw</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;ROC curve (auc = </span><span class="si">%.2f</span><span class="s1">)&#39;</span> <span class="o">%</span><span class="k">auc</span>)
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ROC曲線&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;偽陰性率&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;偽陽性率&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="input">

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 必要なライブラリのインポート</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_boston</span> <span class="c1"># ボストン宅地価格のデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">RandomForestRegressor</span> <span class="c1"># ランダムフォレストのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">KFold</span> <span class="c1"># 交差検証のライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># 評価用ライブラリのインポート</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">mean_absolute_error</span> <span class="c1"># MAE</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">scipy.stats</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">pearsonr</span> <span class="c1">#R</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span> <span class="c1">#R2</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.metrics</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">mean_squared_error</span> <span class="c1"># RMSE, MSE</span>

<span class="c1"># ボストン宅地価格のデータをdataset変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_boston</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># Xという変数に説明変数（特徴量）をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># yという変数に目的変数をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="c1"># MEDV : 持家住宅の中央価格($1000単位)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;MEDV&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># ランダムフォレスト関数をforest変数に代入</span>
<span class="n">forest</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">RandomForestRegressor</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># それぞれのモデル関数とモデル名を格納する</span>
<span class="n">models</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">forest</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">model_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;CV1&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;CV2&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;CV3&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;CV4&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;CV5&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">eval_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;MAE&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;R&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;R2&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;MSE&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;RMSE&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">cv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">KFold</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_splits</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">shuffle</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 評価値を格納する空リスト</span>
<span class="nb">eval</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="c1"># クロスバリデーションの検証用データの格納する空リスト</span>
<span class="n">valid_y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="n">valid_y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">test</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">):</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># モデル訓練</span>
    <span class="n">forest</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,],</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train</span><span class="p">,])</span>
    <span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルで予測値を計算</span>
    <span class="n">y_pred</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">forest</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">,])</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># クロスバリデーションの検証用データの格納</span>
    <span class="n">valid_y_pred</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">valid_y</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># MAE, R, R2, MSE, RMSEの計算</span>
    <span class="n">mae</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mean_absolute_error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">r</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pearsonr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">r2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">r2_score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">mse</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mean_squared_error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">)</span>  
    <span class="n">rmse</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sqrt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mean_squared_error</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">test</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">y_pred</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="c1"># MAE, R, R2, MSE, RMSEの計算値をtmp_evalに格納</span>
    <span class="n">tmp_eval</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">mae</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">r</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">r2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mse</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">rmse</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="nb">eval</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tmp_eval</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 評価値をデータフレーム形式で表示</span>
<span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">eval</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">eval_names</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">model_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>

<h2 id="5.-&#21069;&#20966;&#29702;"><strong>5. &#21069;&#20966;&#29702;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#5.-&#21069;&#20966;&#29702;">&#182;</a></h2>
</div>
