<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="5.1-One-Hot&#12456;&#12531;&#12467;&#12540;&#12486;&#12441;&#12451;&#12531;&#12463;&#12441;"><strong>5.1 One-Hot&#12456;&#12531;&#12467;&#12540;&#12486;&#12441;&#12451;&#12531;&#12463;&#12441;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#5.1-One-Hot&#12456;&#12531;&#12467;&#12540;&#12486;&#12441;&#12451;&#12531;&#12463;&#12441;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>基本的に機械学習の説明変数に文字などは扱えない <br>
そのような変数を学習できるように，数値に置き換えるための手法</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandasを読み込む</span>

<span class="c1"># データを作成する</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="s1">&#39;id&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span> <span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">],</span>
        <span class="s1">&#39;workclass&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;Government Employee&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Self Employed&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Private Employee&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Private Employee&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1"># df変数にデータフレーム形式で代入</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="get_dummies"><strong>get_dummies</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#get_dummies">&#182;</a></h4><p>One-Hotエンコーディングを行うためのメソッド</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_dummies</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;名前&#39;</span> <span class="p">:[</span><span class="s1">&#39;田中&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;佐藤&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;山田&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;山崎&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;役職&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;営業部部長&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;広報部課長&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;技術顧問&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;人事部部長&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;身長&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">193</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">163</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">173</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">155</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;体重&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">70</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">59</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">68</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;血液型&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;A&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;O&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;AB&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;B&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;星座&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;山羊座&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;牡羊座&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;乙女座&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;獅子座&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_dummies</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>dataの中身を書き換え，pd.get_dummies(df)を実行して，どのように変わるかどうか確認してみる</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;名前&#39;</span> <span class="p">:[</span><span class="s1">&#39;田中&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;佐藤&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;山田&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;山崎&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;役職&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;営業部部長&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;広報部課長&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;技術顧問&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;人事部部長&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;身長&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">193</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">163</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">173</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">155</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;体重&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">70</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">59</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">68</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;血液型&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;A&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;O&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;AB&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;B&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;星座&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;山羊座&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;牡羊座&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;乙女座&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;獅子座&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_dummies</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="5.2-&#27424;&#25613;&#20516;&#12398;&#23550;&#24540;"><strong>5.2 &#27424;&#25613;&#20516;&#12398;&#23550;&#24540;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#5.2-&#27424;&#25613;&#20516;&#12398;&#23550;&#24540;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#12469;&#12531;&#12503;&#12523;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#35501;&#12415;&#36796;&#12415;"><strong>&#12469;&#12531;&#12503;&#12523;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#35501;&#12415;&#36796;&#12415;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#12469;&#12531;&#12503;&#12523;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#35501;&#12415;&#36796;&#12415;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">nan</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">NA</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>

<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./sample.csv&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>データに空欄がある場合，そこのデータは"NaN"となる</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#27424;&#25613;&#20516;&#12364;&#12354;&#12427;&#12363;&#12398;&#30906;&#35469;"><strong>&#27424;&#25613;&#20516;&#12364;&#12354;&#12427;&#12363;&#12398;&#30906;&#35469;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#27424;&#25613;&#20516;&#12364;&#12354;&#12427;&#12363;&#12398;&#30906;&#35469;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># True or False で 欠損値があるかないかを返す</span>
<span class="c1"># isnullメソッド</span>
<span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isnull</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>.isnull()は欠損値（NaN）がのデータをTrueで返す</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#sumメソッドを使って欠損値の個数を列ごとに見られる</span>
<span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isnull</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#27424;&#25613;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#21066;&#38500;"><strong>&#27424;&#25613;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#21066;&#38500;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#27424;&#25613;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#21066;&#38500;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#同様に、axis=1を設定すればNaNを含んでいる特徴量（列）を削除できる。</span>
<span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#欠損値を含む列を削除する</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;columns&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># すべてNaNである行を削除</span>
<span class="c1"># この場合は全行残る</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">how</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;all&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># データを作成する</span>
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="s1">&#39;id&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nan</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span> <span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">],</span>
        <span class="s1">&#39;workclass&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nan</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Self Employed&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Private Employee&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Private Employee&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
        <span class="s1">&#39;workclass2&#39;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">nan</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Self Employed&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Private Employee&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Self Employed&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="c1"># データフレーム形式に変換しprint表示</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="c1"># データフレーム形式に変換し，すべてNaNである行を削除</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">how</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;all&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># NaNでない値が3つ未満の行を削除</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">thresh</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 特定の列にNaNが含まれている行だけを削除</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dropna</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">subset</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;Data2&#39;</span><span class="p">]))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 列Data2の欠損値を20で穴埋め</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span>

<span class="c1">#アイリスデータセットをロードし，dataset変数に代入する</span>

<span class="c1"># Xという変数に説明変数（特徴量）をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># yという変数に目的変数をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<h4 id="&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#12434;&#12503;&#12525;&#12483;&#12488;&#12377;&#12427;"><strong>&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#12434;&#12503;&#12525;&#12483;&#12488;&#12377;&#12427;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#12434;&#12503;&#12525;&#12483;&#12488;&#12377;&#12427;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#２つの説明変数を選択する</span>
<span class="n">x1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">x2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="c1">#２つの説明変数のみのデータを抽出</span>
<span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">]]</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#目的変数が0の説明変数x1とx2をプロットする</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">scatter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">x2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">marker</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;x&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#目的変数が1の説明変数x1とx2をプロットする</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">scatter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">x2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">marker</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;x&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#目的変数が2の説明変数x1とx2をプロットする</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">scatter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">x2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">marker</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;x&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;花びらの長さ&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;花びらの幅&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grid</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

</div>

<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 標準化</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span>
<span class="n">stdsc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># 訓練用のデータを標準化</span>
<span class="n">X_train_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stdsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練用データを基準にテストデータも標準化</span>
<span class="n">X_test_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stdsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 平均と標準偏差を確認する</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;平均（訓練データ）：&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_train_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;標準偏差（訓練データ）：&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_train_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;平均（テストデータ）：&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;標準偏差（テストデータ）：&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 正規化</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">MinMaxScaler</span>
<span class="n">mmsc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MinMaxScaler</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># 訓練用のデータを正規化する</span>
<span class="n">X_train_norm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練用データを基準にテストデータも正規化</span>
<span class="n">X_test_norm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 正規化後の最大値と最小値を確認する</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;正規化した訓練データの最大値:&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_train_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;正規化した訓練データの最小値:&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">X_train_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">min</span><span class="p">())</span> <span class="c1">#</span>
<span class="c1"># test用はtrainを基準に標準化してるので、多少0,1からずれる</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;正規化したテストデータの最大値:&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">X_test_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">())</span> 
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;正規化したテストデータの最小値:&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">X_test_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">min</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;equal&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">scatter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">marker</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;x&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;org&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">scatter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x_norm</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">x_norm</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;green&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">marker</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;x&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;norm&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<h4 id="&#12525;&#12472;&#12473;&#12486;&#12451;&#12483;&#12463;&#22238;&#24112;&#12434;&#29992;&#12356;&#12390;&#27161;&#28310;&#21270;&#12398;&#21069;&#24460;&#12391;&#27604;&#36611;">&#12525;&#12472;&#12473;&#12486;&#12451;&#12483;&#12463;&#22238;&#24112;&#12434;&#29992;&#12356;&#12390;&#27161;&#28310;&#21270;&#12398;&#21069;&#24460;&#12391;&#27604;&#36611;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#12525;&#12472;&#12473;&#12486;&#12451;&#12483;&#12463;&#22238;&#24112;&#12434;&#29992;&#12356;&#12390;&#27161;&#28310;&#21270;&#12398;&#21069;&#24460;&#12391;&#27604;&#36611;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression
from matplotlib.colors import ListedColormap</p>
<p>lr = LogisticRegression()
lr_std = LogisticRegression()</p>
<h1 id="&#20803;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#12398;&#20104;&#28204;&#31934;&#24230;">&#20803;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#12398;&#20104;&#28204;&#31934;&#24230;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#20803;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#12398;&#20104;&#28204;&#31934;&#24230;">&#182;</a></h1><p>lr.fit(X_train,y_train)
print('元データのスコア :',lr.score(X_test,y_test))</p>
<h1 id="&#27161;&#28310;&#21270;&#12375;&#12383;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#12398;&#20104;&#28204;&#31934;&#24230;">&#27161;&#28310;&#21270;&#12375;&#12383;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#12398;&#20104;&#28204;&#31934;&#24230;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#27161;&#28310;&#21270;&#12375;&#12383;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12398;&#12514;&#12487;&#12523;&#12398;&#20104;&#28204;&#31934;&#24230;">&#182;</a></h1><p>lr_std.fit(X_train_std,y_train)

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>最近の機械学習アルゴリズムの性能やデータセットの種類によっては標準化を行わなくても良い学習モデルを作成できる</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#12508;&#12473;&#12488;&#12531;&#12398;&#23429;&#22320;&#20385;&#26684;&#12398;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12475;&#12483;&#12488;&#12391;&#27604;&#36611;"><strong>&#12508;&#12473;&#12488;&#12531;&#12398;&#23429;&#22320;&#20385;&#26684;&#12398;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12475;&#12483;&#12488;&#12391;&#27604;&#36611;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#12508;&#12473;&#12488;&#12531;&#12398;&#23429;&#22320;&#20385;&#26684;&#12398;&#12487;&#12540;&#12479;&#12475;&#12483;&#12488;&#12391;&#27604;&#36611;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 必要なライブラリのインポート</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_boston</span> <span class="c1"># ボストン宅地価格のデータセット</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">japanize_matplotlib</span> <span class="c1"># プロット日本語対応ライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span> <span class="c1">#データを訓練とテストに分割するためのライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">RandomForestRegressor</span> <span class="c1"># ランダムフォレストのライブラリ</span>

<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_boston</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># Xという変数に説明変数（特徴量）をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># yという変数に目的変数をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="c1"># MEDV : 持家住宅の中央価格($1000単位)</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;MEDV&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 標準化</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span>
<span class="n">stdsc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># 訓練用のデータを標準化</span>
<span class="n">X_train_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stdsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練用データを基準にテストデータも標準化</span>
<span class="n">X_test_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">stdsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span> 
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="p">())</span> 
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Gradient-Boosting&#12434;&#20351;&#12387;&#12390;&#30906;&#35469;"><strong>Gradient Boosting&#12434;&#20351;&#12387;&#12390;&#30906;&#35469;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Gradient-Boosting&#12434;&#20351;&#12387;&#12390;&#30906;&#35469;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 必要なライブラリのインポート</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span>

<span class="c1"># モデル構築、パラメータはデフォルト</span>
<span class="n">xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">xgb_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;元データのスコア :&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train_std</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;標準化したデータのスコア :&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test_std</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 正規化</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">MinMaxScaler</span>
<span class="n">mmsc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MinMaxScaler</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練用のデータを正規化する</span>
<span class="n">X_train_norm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># 訓練用データを基準にテストデータも正規化</span>
<span class="n">X_test_norm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mmsc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">min</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">min</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 必要なライブラリのインポート</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.ensemble</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span>

<span class="c1"># モデル構築、パラメータはデフォルト</span>
<span class="n">xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">xgb_norm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingRegressor</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1">#元のデータのモデルの予測精度</span>
<span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;元データのスコア :&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="c1">#正規化したデータのモデルの予測精度</span>
<span class="n">xgb_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train_norm</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;正規化したデータのスコア :&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">xgb_norm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test_norm</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="5.4-&#29305;&#24500;&#37327;&#65288;&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#65289;&#36984;&#25246;"><strong>5.4 &#29305;&#24500;&#37327;&#65288;&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#65289;&#36984;&#25246;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#5.4-&#29305;&#24500;&#37327;&#65288;&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#65289;&#36984;&#25246;">&#182;</a></h4><h4 id="Filter-Method"><strong>Filter Method</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Filter-Method">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#20998;&#25955;&#12434;&#25351;&#27161;&#12395;&#29305;&#24500;&#37327;&#65288;&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#65289;&#12434;&#36984;&#25246;"><strong>&#20998;&#25955;&#12434;&#25351;&#27161;&#12395;&#29305;&#24500;&#37327;&#65288;&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#65289;&#12434;&#36984;&#25246;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#20998;&#25955;&#12434;&#25351;&#27161;&#12395;&#29305;&#24500;&#37327;&#65288;&#35500;&#26126;&#22793;&#25968;&#65289;&#12434;&#36984;&#25246;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.feature_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">VarianceThreshold</span> <span class="c1"># 分散による特徴量選択ライブラリ</span>

<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./Tm_data.csv&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 特徴量と目的変数をXとyに代入</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">249</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="c1"># 全行対象,3-249列目をXとする</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>  <span class="c1"># 全行対象,2列名を目的変数にする</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#20998;&#25955;&#12364;0&#12398;&#12418;&#12398;&#12434;&#21066;&#38500;&#12377;&#12427;&#12465;&#12540;&#12473;"><strong>&#20998;&#25955;&#12364;0&#12398;&#12418;&#12398;&#12434;&#21066;&#38500;&#12377;&#12427;&#12465;&#12540;&#12473;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#20998;&#25955;&#12364;0&#12398;&#12418;&#12398;&#12434;&#21066;&#38500;&#12377;&#12427;&#12465;&#12540;&#12473;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 分散が0（すべて同じ値）のデータは削除します</span>
<span class="n">sel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">VarianceThreshold</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">threshold</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">sel</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># get_supportで保持するデータする数を表示する（True or Falseで表示）</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sel</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_support</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="c1"># Trueの数を数える</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sel</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_support</span><span class="p">()))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Trueの列を選択し直す</span>
<span class="n">X_train_filter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X_train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="n">sel</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_support</span><span class="p">()]</span>

<h2 id="6.-&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12540;&#12481;&#12517;&#12540;&#12491;&#12531;&#12464;"><strong>6. &#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12540;&#12481;&#12517;&#12540;&#12491;&#12531;&#12464;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#6.-&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12540;&#12481;&#12517;&#12540;&#12491;&#12531;&#12464;">&#182;</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="6.1-&#27231;&#26800;&#23398;&#32722;&#25163;&#27861;&#12398;&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12434;&#35519;&#25972;&#12377;&#12427;"><strong>6.1 &#27231;&#26800;&#23398;&#32722;&#25163;&#27861;&#12398;&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12434;&#35519;&#25972;&#12377;&#12427;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#6.1-&#27231;&#26800;&#23398;&#32722;&#25163;&#27861;&#12398;&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12434;&#35519;&#25972;&#12377;&#12427;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Elastic-Net-&#65306;&#955;&#12434;&#35519;&#25972;&#12377;&#12427;&#65288;scikit-learn&#19978;&#12391;&#12399;&#945;&#34920;&#35352;&#65289;"><strong>Elastic Net &#65306;&#955;&#12434;&#35519;&#25972;&#12377;&#12427;&#65288;scikit-learn&#19978;&#12391;&#12399;&#945;&#34920;&#35352;&#65289;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#Elastic-Net-&#65306;&#955;&#12434;&#35519;&#25972;&#12377;&#12427;&#65288;scikit-learn&#19978;&#12391;&#12399;&#945;&#34920;&#35352;&#65289;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span> <span class="c1"># numpy</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.linear_model</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">ElasticNet</span>

<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># Xという変数に説明変数（特徴量）をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># yという変数に目的変数をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#ElasticNet</span>
<span class="n">En</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ElasticNet</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">l1_ratio</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_iter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>L1正則化 : パラメータ削減</p>
<p>L2正則化 : 学習の精度を上げる</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>alphaはL1とL2正則化の強さを調整 <br>
alphaが1の時 L1正則化（Lasso） <br>
alphaが0の時 L2正則化（Ridge） <br>
0&lt;alpha&lt;1 の時 Elastic net <br>
l1_ratio は 0&lt;alpha&lt;1 の時のL1正則化の比率調整する</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># パラメータ</span>
<span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.1</span>
<span class="n">ratio</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.1</span>
<span class="c1">#ElasticNet</span>
<span class="n">En</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ElasticNet</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">l1_ratio</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">ratio</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_iter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
<span class="n">En</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 説明変数（特徴量）をfeat_namesに代入</span>
<span class="n">feat_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;がくの長さ(Sepal Length)&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;がくの幅 (Sepal Width)&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;花びらの長さ (Petal Length)&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;花びらの幅 (Petal Width)&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1"># 訓練したモデルの回帰係数 ridge.coef_ を pandas Series型としてcoefに代入．feat_namesを使ってそれぞれにindex名を付ける．</span>
<span class="n">coef</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">En</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">coef_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">feat_names</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 回帰係数が大きい順にソート</span>
<span class="n">imp_coef</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">coef</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># 水平棒グラフ</span>
<span class="n">imp_coef</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kind</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;barh&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># タイトルを付ける</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Ridge回帰係数&quot;</span><span class="p">);</span>

<span class="c1"># 精度</span>
<span class="n">En</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#12469;&#12509;&#12540;&#12488;&#12505;&#12463;&#12479;&#12540;&#12510;&#12471;&#12540;&#12531;"><strong>&#12469;&#12509;&#12540;&#12488;&#12505;&#12463;&#12479;&#12540;&#12510;&#12471;&#12540;&#12531;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#12469;&#12509;&#12540;&#12488;&#12505;&#12463;&#12479;&#12540;&#12510;&#12471;&#12540;&#12531;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span> <span class="c1"># numpy</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span> <span class="c1"># pandas</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.datasets</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span> <span class="c1"># プロットライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.svm</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">SVC</span>

<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># Xという変数に説明変数（特徴量）をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># yという変数に目的変数をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># データを訓練とテストに分割</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>svm.SVC(C=C, gamma=gamma)</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>コストパラメータ: C <br>
分類の誤りをどの程度許容するか <br></p>
<p>RBFカーネルのパラメータ: γ（gamma） <br>
γの値が小さいほど単純な決定境界 <br>
大きいほど複雑な決定境界となる <br></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># パラメータ</span>
<span class="n">C</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span>
<span class="n">gamma</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span>

<span class="c1">#SVM</span>
<span class="n">SVM</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">svm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">SVC</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">gamma</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">gamma</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># .fit(モデル訓練用説明変数（特徴量），　モデル訓練用目的変数)でモデル訓練する．</span>
<span class="n">SVM</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 精度</span>
<span class="n">SVM</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="6.2-&#12495;&#12452;&#12497;&#12540;&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12481;&#12517;&#12540;&#12491;&#12531;&#12464;"><strong>6.2 &#12495;&#12452;&#12497;&#12540;&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12481;&#12517;&#12540;&#12491;&#12531;&#12464;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#6.2-&#12495;&#12452;&#12497;&#12540;&#12497;&#12521;&#12513;&#12540;&#12479;&#12481;&#12517;&#12540;&#12491;&#12531;&#12464;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#12464;&#12522;&#12483;&#12489;&#12469;&#12540;&#12481;"><strong>&#12464;&#12522;&#12483;&#12489;&#12469;&#12540;&#12481;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#12464;&#12522;&#12483;&#12489;&#12469;&#12540;&#12481;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">datasets</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">svm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">model_selection</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.model_selection</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span> <span class="c1"># GridSearchCVはグリッドサーチ用のライブラリ</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.svm</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">SVC</span>

<span class="c1">#アイリスデータセットをロードし，dataset変数に代入する</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># Xという変数に説明変数（特徴量）をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># yという変数に目的変数をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># サーチするパラメータリスト(Cとgamma)</span>
<span class="n">pbounds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;C&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1.0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">400</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;gamma&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1.0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">400</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># pboundsのリストの組み合わせでグリッドサーチをする</span>
<span class="n">grid_search</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">svm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">SVC</span><span class="p">(),</span> <span class="n">pbounds</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_test</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;best_params:</span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s2">&quot;</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">grid_search</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#12505;&#12452;&#12474;&#26368;&#36969;&#21270;"><strong>&#12505;&#12452;&#12474;&#26368;&#36969;&#21270;</strong><a class="anchor-link" href="#&#12505;&#12452;&#12474;&#26368;&#36969;&#21270;">&#182;</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">bayes_opt</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">BayesianOptimization</span> <span class="c1">#ベイズ最適ライブラリ</span>

<span class="c1"># 1変数関数の定義</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">f</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">5</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">20</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">3</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">10</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">300</span>

<span class="c1"># 最適化するパラメータの下限・上限 (xのみ)</span>
<span class="n">pbounds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;x&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">5.0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">5.0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1"># 関数と最適化するパラメータを渡す </span>
<span class="c1"># fはモデルを入力する（ここでは上で定義した関数）</span>
<span class="c1"># pboundsは探索するパラメータの範囲</span>
<span class="n">optimizer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">BayesianOptimization</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pbounds</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pbounds</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 最適化 </span>
<span class="c1"># 計算回数：iter = init_points + n_iter </span>
<span class="n">optimizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">maximize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">init_points</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">svm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">model_selection</span>

<span class="c1">#アイリスデータセットをロードし，dataset変数に代入する</span>
<span class="n">dataset</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_iris</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># Xという変数に説明変数（特徴量）をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_names</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># yという変数に目的変数をデータフレームの形で代入する．columnsで列名を設定する．</span>
<span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dataset</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">target</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">validate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">gamma</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="c1"># 与えられたパラメータでSVMのモデルを初期化</span>
    <span class="n">model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">svm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">SVC</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">gamma</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">gamma</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># 5-Foldで交差検証</span>
    <span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">model_selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cross_validate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">model</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cv</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># 精度を返す</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;test_score&#39;</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 最適化するパラメータの下限・上限 (Cとgamma)</span>
<span class="n">pbounds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;C&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.001</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="s1">&#39;gamma&#39;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.001</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1"># 関数と最適化するパラメータを渡す</span>
<span class="n">optimizer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">BayesianOptimization</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">validate</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pbounds</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pbounds</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 最適化 iter = init_points + n_iter</span>
<span class="n">optimizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">maximize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">init_points</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_iter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">acq</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;ucb&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In&nbsp;[&nbsp;]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
